statements: UPDATE product_catalog SET price = 25.99, quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE product_catalog SET product_name = 'New Product', description = 'Updated Description' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE product_catalog SET price = 99.99, quantity = 10 WHERE product_id = 100
UPDATE product_catalog SET description = 'New Description', product_name = 'Updated Product' WHERE product_id = 200
UPDATE products SET price = 50.00, product_description = 'Updated description' WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE product_images SET image_url = 'example.com/image1.png' WHERE product_id = 3 and image_id = 5;
UPDATE products SET price = 29.99, category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE product_images pi SET image_url = 'http://example.com/image.jpg' FROM products p WHERE pi.product_id = p.product_id AND p.product_name = 'Laptop';
UPDATE ProductCatalog SET price = 19.99, description = 'New and Improved version' WHERE product_id = 12345;
UPDATE ProductInventory SET available_quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 12345;
UPDATE ProductCatalog SET price = 99.99, description = 'New and improved product description' WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE ProductInventory SET available_quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 201 AND location = 'Warehouse A';
UPDATE Products SET price = 25.00 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE Products SET description = 'New Description' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE Products SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE product_catalog SET price = 25.99, stock_quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE product_ratings SET rating = 4.5 WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE product_catalog SET price = 49.99, stock_quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE product_reviews SET reviewer_name = 'John Doe', review_text = 'Great product, highly recommended!' WHERE review_id = 5;
